Check Form Status

Track the progress of your submitted pension forms using your reference number.

Status Lookup

Enter your reference number to check the status of your form submission. Reference numbers are provided via email when you submit a form.

Your reference number was provided when you submitted your form online.

Reference Number Examples

Employee Forms:

  • • EE-000001 (Employee Enrollment)
  • • T2BC-000001 (Tier 2 Benefit Claim)
  • • T3BC-000001 (Tier 3 Benefit Claim)

Employer & Other Forms:

  • • ER-000001 (Employer Enrollment)
  • • PPC-000001 (Personal Pension Claim)
  • • T2BenC-000001 (Beneficiary Claims)

Need Additional Help?

• If you can't find your reference number, check your email confirmation

• Reference numbers are case-sensitive, please enter exactly as provided

• For urgent matters, contact our office directly

• Processing times vary by form type (typically 2-5 business days)
